channel.title: Decompiling a client
channel.description: hey guys... i have a client i need to use but it only has the class files... so i need to decompile it to get the java files back, so i can edit it, ive got a decompiler im just very confused on how to use it... if anyone knows how to decompile and has msn please add me... morgan_92@hotmail.com or leave your msn adress on this thread... thanks alot.

item.title: Decompiling a client
item.dc:creator: @djmorgan92 djmorgan92
item.description:
@djmorgan92 wrote:

downloading it now… im still very confused on which specific files you have to decompile…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2009, 04:33:03 am[/size][hr]okay this is what i got… i decompiled client.class and the EGUI and saved them as java files in my client files… compiled… this is what i got

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling a client
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I use DJ Java Decompiler
You just open the class file with it, then click the save button and it saves it as .java

Read full topic
